you are, together with the team, responsible for the calendar management.
you are, together with the team, responsible for a clean work environment.
Job requirements
Who you are
Certified masseur.
Minimal 1 year experience as a masseur, experience as beautician is a plus.
Affinitiy with a commercial environment is preferred.
You are eager to learn and want to continue your development.
Hands-on mentality, proactive attitude.
You have good social skills, integrity and discretion.
Other important elements:
For this position, we require a Police Clearance Certificate (PCC) during the application process.
Workweek of 10 hours a week, 1 day in the weekend and a daypart during the week.
You are willing and available to work on Saturday of one week and Sunday of the other week alternating.
A test treatment is part of the application procedure.
Additional information
What you can expect from us
Possibility to contribute actively to a sustainable society.
Informal and transparant company culture.
Dynamic and wonderful work environment.
